segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, climbing on that stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, it looks dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he's not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be helping him down, not encouraging this behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just drying her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't tip over, someone could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery with all that water, it's an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should intervene, but I don't want to cause a scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is really making me upset, seeing such recklessness.
segments.speaker: PAR
